entry.title: About me
entry.content:
Chen, Yu-Tong 陈昱同
AubreyChenyt@gmail.com
Institute of Atmospheric Physics, Chinese Academy of Sciences

Education

Sep.2021 - Jun.2024    Institute of Atmospheric Physics, CAS
Beijing, China

M.S in Atmospheric Sciences
  • Master's thesis: Precipitation Numerical Forecast Correction Based on Sample Strategy and Physically Constrained Deep Learning
Sep.2017 - Jun.2021    Beijing Institute of Technology
Beijing, China

B.S. in Applied Physics

Interests

  • AI for Atmospheric Sciences.
  • Physics-constrained deep learning.

Skills

  • Proficiency in Python.
  • Manipulating scientific datasets.
  • Designing, programming, and training DL models on GPU servers.
  • Research experience in scientific DL for atmospheric science.

Publications

Wang Y, Huang G, Pan B, Lin P, Niklas B, Tao W, Chen Y, Liu B, Li H (2024) Correcting Climate Model Sea Surface Temperature Simulations with Generative Adversarial Networks: Climatology, Interannual Variability, and Extremes. Adv Atmos Sci. https://doi.org/10.1007/s00376-024-3288-6

Chen Y, Wang Y, Huang G, Tian Q (2024) Coupling Physical Factors for Precipitation Forecast in China With Graph Neural Network. Geophysical Research Letters 51:e2023GL106676. https://doi.org/10.1029/2023GL106676

Chen Y, Huang G, Wang Y, et al (2023) Improving the heavy rainfall forecasting using a weighted deep learning model. Front Environ Sci 11:1116672. https://doi.org/10.3389/fenvs.2023.1116672


Experiences

  • AGU23 oral presentation
    Online 2023
    • Topic: Coupling Physical Factors for Precipitation Forecast in China with Graph Neural Network
  • Scientific research training, Beijing Institute of Technology
    Beijing, China 2020
    • Research Topic: Paper-based microfluidic chip for the detection of nitrite ions, trivalent iron ions, and nickel ions in water.
  • Yan Jici summer internship, Institute of Physics, CAS
    Beijing, China 2019
    • Research Topic: Studying the structure of DNA single molecules using magnetic tweezers.

Honours

Jul.2023    The First Qilu Fengyun Meteorological Intelligent Algorithm Challenge Third Prize (18/1248)
Dec.2019    Merit Student of Beijing Institute of Technology
Mar.2019    The First Prize Scholarship, Beijing Institute of Technolog
